sentences.en: After computer printers and duffle bags had been carried to dorm rooms, everyone gathered in the gymnasium, students on one side of the bleachers, parents on the other.
sentences.cn: 电脑打印机和行李包都运进了宿舍之后，所有人都到学校的体育馆集合，学生在露天看台的一侧，家长们在另一侧。

sentences.en: After several sessions at the gymnasium, I feel a lot fitter.
sentences.cn: 在体育馆里锻炼了几次以后, 我感觉身体结实多了.

sentences.en: Beautiful buildings gleam in the sun, including the great stadium and the gymnasium.
sentences.cn: 美丽的建筑物在阳光下闪亮, 其中包括巨大的露天运动场和体育馆.

sentences.en: Half of the 36 venues have been completed like this gymnasium hall.
sentences.cn: 个比赛场地中有一半设施已经完工,比如这个体操场馆.

sentences.en: He goes to the gymnasium every afternoon to sweat off some weight.
sentences.cn: 他每天下午去健身房以减轻一点体重.

sentences.en: He had developed his unusual toughness by working out daily at a gymnasium.
sentences.cn: 他每天在体操房里顽强地苦练,终于练得非常强健坚韧.

sentences.en: I have found a new gymnasium.
sentences.cn: 我找到一个新的健身房。

sentences.en: I met her at the gymnasium.
sentences.cn: 我在体育馆遇见她.

sentences.en: I stood in the packed gymnasium, in a crowd of anxious spouses, children and relatives.
sentences.cn: 我站在拥挤的体育馆，站在急切配偶的人群中，有子女和亲属。

sentences.en: I thought they taught boxing in the school gymnasium.
sentences.cn: 我原以为他们在学校的体育馆里教授拳击.

sentences.en: It took us several hours to get the gymnasium ready for the ball.
sentences.cn: 我们花了几个小时把体育馆收拾好供舞会用.

sentences.en: Our school has a big gymnasium.
sentences.cn: 我们学校有座大型体育馆.

sentences.en: Our volleyball team will play away tomorrow and play games in the gymnasium on Saturday.
sentences.cn: 我们的排球队明天将去外地比赛，星期六则要在体育馆比赛。

sentences.en: The athletic association gave a dinner in the gymnasium to all of the winners.
sentences.cn: 运动员联合会在健身房请优胜者吃饭.

sentences.en: The basketball nets hung down from the ceiling at either end of the gymnasium.
sentences.cn: 篮筐分别从体育馆两头的天花板上悬吊下来。

sentences.en: The daily tariff includes accommodation and unlimited use of the pool and gymnasium.
sentences.cn: 日常费用包括住宿以及游泳池和健身房的不限时使用。

sentences.en: The game will be staged in the gymnasium.
sentences.cn: 竞赛将在体育馆举行.

sentences.en: The next day, the arsonist was arrested at a gymnasium.
sentences.cn: 第二天，纵火犯在一家体育馆被逮捕了。

sentences.en: The school will theme its gymnasium in holiday ornaments.
sentences.cn: 学校将以假期为主题装饰体育馆.

sentences.en: There was a basketball game at the Municipal Gymnasium yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天市体育馆有场篮球比赛.

sentences.en: They advertised on posters outside the stadium to promise that every competitor is to have a regular physical examination in a gymnasium one after another.
sentences.cn: 他们在体育场外的海报上做广告，承诺说每个参赛者都将在体育馆一个一个地参加常规的身体检查。

trans.tran_cn: 健身房，体育馆，大学预科，高级中学
